getAmountOut(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Calculate output amount for a given input (for UI/preview)

params.liquidity: Amount of LP tokens to burn

swap(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Swap tokens using constant product formula

params.amount0In: Amount of token0 to swap in (0 if swapping token1 for token0)
params.amount1In: Amount of token1 to swap in (0 if swapping token0 for token1)
params.minAmountOut: Minimum amount of tokens expected out
